snippet: Ryder Hesjedal of Canada won the mountainous 14th stage of the Vuelta a España, and Alberto Contador held on to the overall lead for a fourth straight day.
abstract: Ryder Hesjedal of Canada wins the 14th stage of the Vuelta a Espana, and Alberto Contador holds onto the overall lead for a fourth straight day; other cycling news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ryder Hesjedal of Canada won the mountainous 14th stage of the Vuelta a España, and Alberto Contador held on to the overall lead for a fourth straight day.

headline.main: Alberto Contador Increases Lead at Vuelta a España
